text:
I'm trying to compile httpd version 2.10 with the proxy settings enabled. It compiles but when I go to run it it fails due to the /usr/lib/libc.so.1 file missing. THe current version of glibc-10 only comes with libc.so.6, as does Fedora 11 which is what I am trying to install on.

Can we update httpd to look for libc.so.6 and headers?

Larry Dalton
creator: larry.dalton@insightbb.com

text: You'll need to take this up with your distributions toolchain maintainers, if you determine that it's not your compilation error.
creator: covener@gmail.com
